attributes.action: ADVERTISING COMPANIES TO PAY EACH TIME THEY USE AN ANIMAL IMAGE.
attributes.additional_details: GOVERNMENT TO LEGISLATE THAT EACH TIME ADVERTSING COMPANIES OR TV PROGRAMMES OR WEBSITES USE ANIMAL IMAGES TO PROMOTE THEIR PROGRAMMES OR PRODUCTS THEY SHOULD DONATE MINIMUM 1P PER IMAGE.  MONEY TO GO TO ANIMAL AND WILDLIFE WELFARE ORGANISATIONS AND ANIMAL HABITAT PROTECTION SCHEMES AND CLEAN UP THE OCEAN SCHEMES.
